body.name: Tribesigns Shoe Rack, 8-Tier Tall Shoe Shelf, Wooden Shoe Storage Cabinet, White
body.stockDetail: Only 5 left in stock - order soon.

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: DURABLE AND RELIABLE: Say goodbye to the flimsy and cheap shoe stand closet shoe rack. Made of premium E0 particle board, Our entryway shoe cabinet with solid construction that would not make your shoes wobble or even let them down; 0.59” thicker board enables this shoes organizer load much heavier duty and more durable while using.

ELEGANT HOME DECOR: Crafted with wooden board and finely polished with water-proof and wear-resistant white paint, this eye-catching shoes rack organizer will impress your friends deeply when they enter your home. Whether in the room or in the hallway, adds a warm touch and some modern flair, to be decorative enough to suit any corner of your house.

MORE FLEXIBLE: The top shelf of this shoe stand can be used to place your bags, keys, potted plants and decorations; Each shelf is flexibly designed to be detachable that can easily accommodate shoes with different heels. Our shoe storage cabinet can easily organize messy shoes for your family. Product Dimension: 25.59” L x 11.81” W x 47.24”.

SIMPLE AND COMPACT DESIGN: Simple design plus powerful function, this shoe storage shelf is not only as a shoe rack, but also can be as a display rack. The open shelf design contributes air circulation and prevent any odor. the space-saving vertical storage design is an ideal storage solution for your hallway, entryway, closet, dormitory, garage.

EFFORTLESS ASSEMBLING: Simple structure of the tribesigns entryway shoe storage, and the detailed instructions make the assembly without stuck. We provide 24 months' warranty and friendly customer service and will give you a satisfactory answer within 24 hours if you have any questions.
body.description: Tribesigns Entryway Shoe Cabinet A lack of storage is never a problem with this entryway organizer! Crafted from durable engineered wooden boards, this shoe rack is a must-have piece in your organizational arsenal.Elegant and minimalist appearance matches well with various house decors; organize your belongings in a functional and stylish way.Space-saving design for entryway, hallway, bedroom and living room, keep the entrance to your home free of clutter! Color: White Number of Shelves: 8 Product Size: 25.59” L x 11.81” W x 47.24” H Material: Quality Particleboard Product Weight: 59 lbs Hold up to 21 pairs of shoes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why Choose Tribesigns? Tribesigns was founded in 2010, we are devoted to providing a warm and cozy home for everyone with our environmental furniture. We have been working with world's famous designers to bring a curate selection of beautiful and high quality furniture to millions of families across America. Package Contents: 1 x Shoe Cabinet 1 x Hardware 1 x Manual Instruction Tribesigns Entryway Shoe Cabinet A lack of storage is never a problem with this entryway organizer! Crafted from durable engineered wooden boards, this shoe rack is a must-have piece in your organizational arsenal.Elegant and minimalist appearance matches well with various house decors; organize your belongings in a functional and stylish way.Space-saving design for entryway, hallway, bedroom and living room, keep the entrance to your home free of clutter! Color: White Number of Shelves: 8 Product Size: 25.59” L x 11.81” W x 47.24” H Material: Quality Particleboard Product Weight: 59 lbs Hold up to 21 pairs of shoes.

Modern Appearance Neat white veneer surface and stream-line design shows simplicity and modernization for your home decor. This shoe cabinet would help you organize your shoes to make your entryway clean and tidy. Sleek Surface This white shoe storage cabinet provides durable and skin-friendly work surfaces, lets you reaching it comfortably. The spacious cabinet top can easily hold your daily essentials or decorative ornaments. More Stable The shoe holder is made of thickened E1 particle board and can hold up to 120 pounds. With power coated finish, this shoes rack is smooth and with strong corrosion resistance. Large Capacity 8-layer shoe shelves provide ample holding and display space for keeping heels, shoes, and ornaments. The shelf is designed to be detachable that can easily accommodate shoes with different heels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome, sturdy shoe rack
reviews.reviewText: Our old shoe rack was a mix of wood and metal. It was OK, but was old and needed to be replaced. I looked long and hard for a shoe rack that would fit our space, and finally found this one.This thing is very substantial. I was surprised carrying the box up the stairs. It was heavy, like 50 pounds. Easy to assemble, not more than 30 minutes.While this is a bit shorter than our old shoe rack, it holds as many shoes. We are able to fit 3 adult pairs of shoes in each shelf, though you may have to alternate orientation - so 1 faces out and 2 face in.Overall, super happy with this purchase. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been looking to make better use of this space in my tiny laundry room. This was the perfect solution!Easy to put together, very sturdy and much prettier than traditional shoe racks. Totally love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, easy to put it together
reviews.reviewText: Nice shoe rack and sturdy. The shelf height is not high enough for hiking shoes. But it still a good rack for regular shoes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great customer service!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: First box came with Broken pieces. Contacted seller and they got one shipped out the next day. Great communication with company via email. Next box came with all parts unbroken. Item was super easy to put together. Maybe 30 minutes to put together completely. Wife was very happy with the shelving unit for her shoes. Happy Wife. Happy Life. Thank you again. I would recommend this product to anyone.Bryan

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and fits lots of shoes
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Great shoe storage shelves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Was able to put together with excellent instruction and required tools. Looks great in my closet and actually does not take up much room. Considering purchasing a second one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy from the seller
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the first shoe shelf and it went just fine. Assembly eyes ordered. The second one was assembled just like the first shelf however it did not go like the first one. It was a problem with it the owner of the company or refusion every time I send a letter they tell me that I need to send pictures. I already sent them many photos. Just to get another note back, saying the same thing. stay clear from this company. You can’t tell people what to buy, but you certainly can tell him what not to buy and this is one of those things you should not buy..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this shoe rack!
reviews.reviewText: Great shoe rack, nice and sturdy. Space between shelves is narrow. It needs a couple more inches between shelves for shoes that have a 3" or more heel. I wear a size 7 shoe and some of my 3" heels did not fit on shelves. It is too small for large women's shoes or men's shoes! It takes about 1 1/2 hours to assemble. It really looks nice in my closet!
Sieht gut aus, praktisch.Mehr Abstand zwischen den Regalen wäre gut, da Winterschuhe nicht komplett reinpassen. Für das oberste Regal wird in der Familie im Winter gekämpft xD
